cc:Work.dc:title: Common Display Resolutions
cc:Work.dc:description: Summary of the most common display resolutions.

path.style: font-size: 12px; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke-width: 0.625; stroke-linejoin: round;
stroke: blue; fill: none; opacity: 0.2;
fill: yellow; opacity: 0.2;
fill: none; stroke: rgb(196, 160, 0);
fill: none; stroke: rgb(164, 0, 0);
fill: none; stroke: rgb(78, 154, 6);
fill: none; stroke: rgb(92, 53, 102);
fill: none; stroke: rgb(206, 92, 0);
fill: none; stroke: rgb(32, 74, 135);
fill: none; stroke: rgb(143, 89, 2);

g.style: font-size: 56px; text-align: center; text-anchor: middle; display: inline;

rect.style: fill: rgb(252, 233, 79); stroke: rgb(196, 160, 0); stroke-width: 6; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4;
fill: rgb(252, 233, 79); stroke: rgb(196, 160, 0); stroke-width: 6; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4;

path.style: fill: none; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 2; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; marker-end: url("#Arrow2Mend"); stroke-miterlimit: 4; display: inline;

rect.style: fill: rgb(233, 185, 110); stroke: rgb(143, 89, 2); stroke-width: 6; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4;
